name: Classic Air Aviation, LLC
about: Classic Air Aviation, LLC, based in Mesa, Arizona, is a FAA part 61 and 141 F-1 & M-1 VISA approved flight school. Established in 2005, we offer self-paced and fast-track flight training programs for private pilots, commercial pilots, military pilots, and certified flight instructors. Our comprehensive training includes ground school, ratings, and endorsements, with a focus on traditional navigation skills and modern technology. We provide military aviation prep courses, simulator training, and various aircraft services such as rentals, sales, and maintenance. Our mid-sized school ensures a personal approach to each student, with flexible payment options and discounts for military members. We are committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals in a friendly and professional environment. Contact us today to start your journey in the sky.
